root.title: adia servic adia sell 500,000 share
root.body: adia servic inc sai agre sell 500,000 share common stock princip stockhold adia s.a price base current market price sale will rais adia s.a. ownership compani 74.7 pct 72.7 pct adia sai compani also sai intend us proce stock sale retir debt work capit gener corpor purpos
